title: GLOBALink | Innovation achievements on show at sci-tech fair in E China
content:
HEFEI, April 26 (Xinhua) -- The China (Anhui) Science and Technology Innovation Achievement Transformation Fair is held in Hefei, capital of east China's Anhui Province from April 26 to 27 both online and offline. More than 400 scientific and technological achievements are exhibited at the convention. In addition, activities including sci-tech achievements auction and online trade of sci-tech innovation products are also held to promote the transformation of scientific and technological achievements. #GLOBALink
Produced by Xinhua Global Service
